acceptSubmission(uint256).details: Accept creator submission and lock their payment

approveDeliverable(uint256).details: Approve delivered content and release payment

cancelBrief(uint256).details: Cancel brief and refund escrow (only if no creators selected)

closeBrief(uint256).details: Close brief to new submissions (manual or auto after deadline)

createBrief(string,string,string,uint256.details: Create a new brief with escrow funding

params._contentDeadline: Unix timestamp for content delivery deadline
params._paymentPerCreator: Payment amount per creator in wei

getBriefSubmissions(uint256).details: Get all submissions for a brief

getSubmission(uint256).details: Get submission details with creator info

getSubmissionsBatch(uint256[]).details: Get multiple submissions (batch query for frontend)

updateBrief(uint256,string,string,string.details: Update brief details (only before submissions accepted)

withdrawPlatformFees().details: Emergency withdraw (owner only, for platform fees)
